Bookmark.name: Bookmark
Bookmark.description: Represents a link between opportunities that share common information.

ID.description: ID of the bookmark. Label is Bookmark ID.

FromId.description: The originating opportunity. Label is Bookmarked From ID

ToId.description: The opportunity to which the originating opportunity is linked. Label is Bookmarked To ID.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.
